resources.string: This is Sweety, the cutest monster on the Earth (as he said).He really likes all kinds of candy, don\'t mind to eat teddy bear or a doll. Nice guy, right? But don\'t be surprised if you\'ll see that he chewing little kitty, baby or a unicorn â€“ they are SO SWEET
Yoggy is a real healthy life style fan. Just look at his headband! He tries to keep a vegetarian diet but all this athletes looks so delicious that he just going CRAZZZZY
Greetings to sir Luxor fon Luxury! A real blue blood from world of monsters. He used to get all the best, so if you want to give him something that under 1000$, just keep it to yourself.
